title: Rage of the Phoenix
description: A woman running from her past finally finds safety and a place to call home. A man who has seen and done things no man should.â€‹Two MC's about to go to war over one woman. Just when things are settled, love hits Phoenix without warning. Her past is dark and she's in a good place for her and her children. Drake, a man haunted by the things he had to do to get his beloved club clean, finally thinks he may have found beauty.Someone's past is going to bite them hard when they aren't looking for it. Before life can be lived the dark must be faced. Who will remain standing when the devil comes looking for them?
author: Elizabeth N. Harris
